orders.title: Order Management
orders.subtitle: Track and manage all your orders
orders.tryDifferentFilters: Try adjusting your filters to find orders
orders.searchPlaceholder: Search orders by order number or customer name...
orders.noOrdersDesc: Orders from vendors will appear here once they are created.
orders.myAssignedOrdersDesc: View and manage orders assigned to you
orders.noAssignedOrdersDesc: You don't have any orders assigned to you yet. Orders will appear here once they are assigned.
orders.rejectOrderDesc: Are you sure you want to reject this order? You can provide an optional reason.
orders.rejectionReasonHelp: This reason will be visible to the vendor.
orders.orderActionsDesc: Accept or reject this pending order
orders.assignPickupAgentDesc: Assign a pickup agent to handle this order
orders.assignDeliveryAgentDesc: Assign a delivery agent to handle this order
orders.assignmentNotesPlaceholder: Add any notes or instructions for the agent...
orders.assignmentNotesHelp: These notes will be visible to the assigned agent
orders.noInventoryAssigned: No inventory assigned to this order
orders.orderAlreadyAssignedDesc: This order is already assigned to an agent. Please complete or cancel the current assignment before assigning to another agent.
orders.orderAlreadyAssignedError: This order is already assigned to an agent. You cannot assign it again.
orders.acceptOrderDesc: Accepting the order will move it to the next phase of processing.
orders.label: LABEL
orders.confirmManualPickupMessage: You are about to mark this order as picked up from the vendor WITHOUT a QR code scan.
orders.confirmManualPickupUseCases: This action should only be used when:
orders.confirmManualPickupCase1: The delivery agent cannot scan the QR code due to technical issues
orders.confirmManualPickupCase2: There is an urgent need to advance the order status
orders.confirmManualWarehouseReceiptMessage: You are about to mark this order as received at the warehouse WITHOUT a QR code scan.
orders.confirmManualWarehouseReceiptUseCases: This action should only be used when:
orders.confirmManualWarehouseReceiptCase1: The warehouse staff cannot scan the QR code due to technical issues
orders.confirmManualWarehouseReceiptCase2: The order physically arrived but the system was not updated
orders.confirmManualDispatchMessage: You are about to mark this order as out for delivery WITHOUT a QR code scan.
orders.confirmManualDispatchUseCases: This action should only be used when:
orders.confirmManualDispatchCase1: The delivery agent cannot scan the QR code due to technical issues
orders.confirmManualDispatchCase2: The order has already left the warehouse but status was not updated
orders.confirmManualDeliveryMessage: You are about to mark this order as DELIVERED without customer OTP verification.
orders.confirmManualDeliveryWarning: WARNING: This bypasses customer confirmation of receipt.
orders.confirmManualDeliveryUseCases: This action should only be used when:
orders.confirmManualDeliveryCase1: The customer has confirmed receipt through another channel (phone call, etc.)
orders.confirmManualDeliveryCase2: There is documented proof of delivery
orders.confirmManualDeliveryCase3: The OTP system experienced a technical failure
orders.confirmManualDeliveryConfirm1: The order was physically delivered to the customer
orders.confirmManualDeliveryConfirm2: You have verified delivery through alternative means
orders.actionWillBeLogged: This action will be logged and attributed to your account.
orders.orderMarkedPickedUp: Order marked as picked up from vendor
orders.orderMarkedReceived: Order marked as received at warehouse
orders.orderMarkedOutForDelivery: Order marked as out for delivery
orders.invalidOrderStatus: Order cannot be updated from current status
orders.noPermissionForAction: You don't have permission to perform this action
orders.featureComingSoonMessage: This feature is currently under development and will be available soon.
orders.featureUnderDevelopmentDesc: We're working hard to bring you this feature. Stay tuned!

adminWallets.adjustmentDescription: Adjust the wallet balance by adding credit or debit
adminWallets.adjustmentReasonPlaceholder: Enter the reason for this adjustment...
adminWallets.adjustmentReasonHelp: This reason will be recorded in the transaction history
adminWallets.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid amount greater than 0
adminWallets.descriptionRequired: Please provide a reason for this adjustment
adminWallets.settlementDescription: Create a settlement for transactions within a specific period
adminWallets.settlementNotesPlaceholder: Enter any notes for this settlement...
adminWallets.settlementInfo: A settlement will be created for all unsettled transactions within the specified period. The settlement type (payout or collection) will be determined automatically based on the balance.
adminWallets.periodRequired: Please select both start and end dates
adminWallets.periodFromBeforeTo: Start date must be before or equal to end date
adminWallets.periodToNotFuture: End date cannot be in the future

adminSettlements.pendingSettlementInfo: This settlement is pending confirmation. Once confirmed, the amount will be settled with the owner.

systemWallet.title: Platform Finances
systemWallet.subtitle: Overview of platform revenue, expenses, and profit
systemWallet.howItWorksDesc: Platform finances track all revenue generated from shipping fees and service charges. The balance represents the total profit accumulated after all payouts and expenses. Credits come from shipping fees collected on orders, while debits include payouts to vendors and agents.
